title: The font size of texts of LinkedIn
content: The font size of texts of LinkedIn became very small to read a couple of weeks ago. I have been using Firefox as an operating system. title: videos will not play in news page
content: In my opening page www.nu.nl there are news videos. Clicking them should lead to these videos to play. In firefox this no longer works. The cursor with rightclick shows: "Open picture" i.l.o. "Open video". Google Chrome browser has no plroblem, the videos play normally. Is this a setting problem? Please help.
creator: rdboers

title: account disconnected, will not connect (windows desktop)
content:
Hi,

For more than a year now firefox on my desktop says it's disconnected. Whenéver I "sign in" to connect, I get a verification to my phone and I log in. The screen says that it worked and I'm ready to browse. But I'm not. I'm right back where I started: disconnected.

I have removed firefox from my computer by uninstalling it and re installing it. I've also removed firefox by hand (deleted folders from /programs/) and re-installed. Nothing works. I just can not sign in to firefox. As a result, I can't sync. And that yellow exclamation mark is driving me nuts :)

What can I do. I only see people on this form who have it after a reboot or after a few days. I'm disconnected permanently.

Kind regards, Floris.
creator: florisontwerpt

title: Mer än ett fönster öppet
content: Fram till i förra veckan öppnades ett separat fönster, med separat ikon, i aktivitetsfältet, när man öppnade en länk. Plötsligt i förra veckan försvann den möjligheten Nu öppnas länken, men hamnar i samma ikon som man redan har öppen. Dvs bakom densamma i aktivitetsfältet. Jag släktforskar och behöver ha mina delade släktträd öppna, och dessutom kunna använda andra websidor samtidigt.
creator: s-bj

creator: ljhcnmt

title: History Autodeletes
content:
Continuation of this thread https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1310388?page=2#answer-1386708 which I didn't reply to for a while and got archived

Ever since the issue I had with tabs not being restored I've taken to simply bookmarking everything I might need later which has resulted in a large number of Bookmarks

Soon after this I noticed my History wasn't being saved beyond 7 days and thought this might be due to the bookmarks competing for resources with the history

I checked places.history.expiration.transient_current_max_pages and it's value is 98675

My disk space fluctuates but it never usually dips below 10GB
creator: darkwolf573

Help! Please!
creator: jessicafarrell1029

title: WidevineCdm crashes on Firefox 78.10 (Mac OS)
content:
WidevinCdm crashes. I have submitted multiple crash reports but not sure if any went through. There was no pop-up window or any field to describe the problem like what the 'Learn more..' link says when the crash occurs.


I have already seen other reports of this problem (e.g. https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1334218 )

Firefox 78.10.0 Mac OS 10.9.5 (Can't upgrade further on existing HW)

I don't like the recommendation on the above URL to install an older version of Firefox. We never tell anyone to go back to old versions of our SW if the bug is created by the new version. For me, the crashes started right AFTER I upgraded Firefox to 78.10.0. I was watching CBS shows. So the crash has a definite connection to the Firefox upgrade. I haven't changed anything else on my MacBook. I had no problem watching the shows on previous versions of Firefox.

To reproduce the crash, try to watch a "free" CBS show ( e.g. https://www.cbs.com/shows/fbi/ ). No subscription needed for a few episodes available for free.
creator: khufia-ffmoz
